options.optionText: Your... assets seem pretty, um, *on display* today.
options.responseText: Oh, what’s the matter? Never seen a pair of tits before? I thought you’d have more... composure.

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m handling it just fine, thanks.
followUpOptions.responseText: Please. You’re sweating like you just ran a marathon. Honestly, it’s cute watching you pretend to have any control.
